basicInformation.description: Wholly Kenyan owned consultancy firm specializing in safety, energy, and plant systems management since 2009. We provide comprehensive solutions for environmental impact assessment, occupational safety, fire safety audits, energy audits, statutory inspections, and professional training across Kenya and East Africa.

businessAddress.street: TBD - Add your specific office address

services.name: Environmental Impact Assessment
services.description: Comprehensive environmental analysis and NEMA compliance documentation

services.name: Occupational Safety Consulting
services.description: Workplace safety audits and DOSH compliance services

services.name: Fire Safety Audit
services.description: Complete fire risk assessment and safety protocol development

services.name: Energy Audit
services.description: Energy efficiency analysis and cost optimization strategies

services.name: Statutory Inspection
services.description: Pressure vessels, lifting equipment, and plant certification

services.name: Non-Destructive Testing
services.description: Material integrity testing without equipment damage

services.name: Fire Safety Training
services.description: Professional fire prevention and emergency response training

services.name: First Aid Training
services.description: Certified first aid and CPR training programs

posts.title: Professional Environmental Impact Assessments
posts.content: Ensure your project meets NEMA requirements with our comprehensive EIA services. From baseline studies to mitigation planning, we guide you through every step of environmental compliance.

posts.title: Workplace Safety Best Practices
posts.content: Did you know that proper safety training can reduce workplace accidents by up to 70%? Our certified programs help protect your most valuable asset - your employees.

posts.title: New DOSH Regulations 2025
posts.content: Stay compliant with the latest occupational safety regulations. Our experts help you understand and implement new requirements to avoid penalties.

posts.title: Helping Kenyan Businesses Thrive Safely
posts.content: From manufacturing to hospitality, we've helped 100+ companies across East Africa achieve safety excellence and regulatory compliance.

faqs.question: What industries do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve manufacturing, construction, oil & gas, mining, food processing, pharmaceutical, chemical, hospitality, healthcare, and educational sectors across Kenya and East Africa.

faqs.question: How long does an environmental impact assessment take?
faqs.answer: EIA duration varies by project complexity, typically 2-6 months including baseline studies, stakeholder consultation, and NEMA approval processes.

faqs.question: Do you provide training certificates?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our training programs provide recognized certificates for fire safety, first aid, and occupational safety that meet Kenyan regulatory requirements.

faqs.question: What areas do you cover?
faqs.answer: We primarily serve Kenya with regional coverage across Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda, Burundi, and South Sudan for specialized projects.
